UI - all user interface stuffÂ¶

  • Animation - helper to make powerfull animations
  • Factory - widget factory, used to make dynamic interface
  • Layout - horizontal, vertical layout arrangment
  • Simulator - implementation of multitouch with mouse
  • UI - core widgets
  • Video - video player widget
  • Wallpaper Window - a simple window with background
  • Window - generic multitouch window
